description: A website header I made in my first year using HTML5 canvas and JavaScript.
A 'virtual' instrument created using Leap Motion, Ableton Live and TouchDesigner.
A visual that reacts to music coming from Ableton Live and hand movements. Made using Ableton Live, Leap Motion and TouchDesigner
Kinetic typography video I made for my Motion class.
An animation made during my internship at Octo to explain how they work.
A simulation made using TouchDesigner at my internship that is to be used on an event.
A Newari style house made in Maya for my 3D class.
I experimented with TouchDesigner, Unity and OSC to create a scene that could be controlled with my phone.
Brand guidelines I made for Octo during my internship there.
Top crocheted using the Suzette stitch.
Experiment on TouchDesigner using real-time data from the Kinect and MediaPipe to create visual effects.
Poster made for Annapurna Brussel Club for its 10th anniversary event.
